pizzerias.name: Motorino
pizzerias.address: Shop A, G/F, 14 Shelley Street, SoHo, Central, Hong Kong
pizzerias.specialty: Hawaiian Pie (San Marzano tomatoes, fior di latte, prosciutto cotto, fresh pineapple, basil)
pizzerias.description: New York-based pizzeria known for authentic Neapolitan-style pizzas cooked in a custom-built wood-burning oven. Their Hawaiian pizza uses premium Italian ham and fresh pineapple.

pizzerias.address: G/F, 49 Elgin Street, SoHo, Central, Hong Kong
pizzerias.specialty: The Big Island (tomato sauce, mozzarella, smoked ham, caramelized pineapple, jalapeños)
pizzerias.description: American-Italian restaurant serving New York-style hand-tossed pizzas. Their Hawaiian variation includes caramelized pineapple and jalapeños for sweet heat.

pizzerias.name: Alvy's
pizzerias.address: 8 Holland Street, Kennedy Town, Hong Kong
pizzerias.specialty: Aloha (tomato sauce, mozzarella, char siu pork, pineapple, spring onion)
pizzerias.description: Neighborhood pizzeria and craft beer bar that combines New York pizza techniques with local Hong Kong flavors. Their Hawaiian pizza replaces ham with Cantonese-style char siu pork.
